metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule idetifies when SCC service is disabled in GCP environment

ruleText:
rule GCP_SCC_service_disabled
{

  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule idetifies when SCC service is disabled in GCP environment"
    severity = "High"

  events:
    //SCC Disabled
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_SECURITYCENTER_MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "COMPUTE_SECURE_BOOT_DISABLED"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Security Command Center"
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google"
    $e.security_result.category_details = "MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.security_result.detection_fields["state"] = "INACTIVE"
    $e.target.application = "compute.googleapis.com"



  condition:
    $e
}
